h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Gold Spikeplate Location
content: The Gold Spikeplate can be found in The New West, specifically within the Valley of Ecstasy, Longevity Road Shrine area. Follow the road along until you reach the Dark-faced Overlord in the back of the area. Defeat it to get the Curios item.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gold_Spikeplate.md', within the main section titled 'Gold Spikeplate', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Gold Spikeplate Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Gold Spikeplate can be found in The New West, specifically within the Valley of Ecstasy, Longevity Road Shrine area. Follow the road along until you reach the Dark-faced Overlord in the back of the area. Defeat it to get the Curios item.
